articles.description: On June 2, 2021, World of Warcraft Classic players will have the opportunity to return to the Outland for the very first time since 2007 in the brand new classic expansion, Burning Crusade Classic. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tLDvM5IDyL8 We sat down with …
articles.content:
On June 2, 2021, World of Warcraft Classic players will have the opportunity to return to the Outland for the very first time since 2007 in the brand new classic expansion, Burning Crusade Classic.
